analyzed: 佛頂放無垢光明入普門觀察一

analyzed: 切如來心陀羅尼經卷下

analyzed: 西天北印度烏填曩國帝
translated: Tripiṭaka master from the imperial palace temple in Uḍḍiyāna, Northern India,🔽śramaṇa Shi Hu bestowed with purple robes by imperial decree, translated by imperial order

analyzed: 若復有人能書寫此佛頂放無垢光明入普門觀察一切如來心陀羅尼。
translated: If there are people who can write out this Buddha's head emitting the immaculate light, entering the universal gate to observe the dhāraṇī of the mind of all tathāgatas,

original: 造塔安置或修飾舊塔安置。
analyzed: 造塔安置或修飾舊塔安置。
translated: build a stūpa to enshrine it, or refurbish an old stūpa to enshrine it,

original: 復以粖香塗香作眾妓樂而為供養。
analyzed: 復以粖香塗香作眾妓樂而為供養。
translated: and make offerings with powdered incense, ointments, and various kinds of music,
and further purify their body and mind,
during one day and night, in the six periods,
chant this dhāraṇī,
and also circumambulate it one hundred and eight times,
they will be able to eliminate all evil karma

original: 能生一切善種天主若欲安置此心明者。
analyzed: 能生一切善種天主若欲安置此心明者。
translated: and give rise to all wholesome seeds. O Heavenly Lord, if you wish to enshrine this mind-dhāraṇī,
at the time when the sun first rises, face east and sit.
Smear the maṇḍala with various fragrant muds.
Face the sun and scatter various flowers.

original: 燒沈水香咄嚕瑟迦香等。
analyzed: 燒沈水香咄嚕瑟迦香等。
translated: Burn agalloch incense, turuṣka incense, and so forth.

original: 歸命頂禮一切如來一百八遍。
analyzed: 歸命頂禮一切如來一百八遍。
translated: Take refuge and bow to all tathāgatas one hundred and eight times.
Write this heart-mind mantra and place it in the stūpa.

original: 由如以九十九百千俱胝那餘多殑伽沙等如來。
analyzed: 由如以九十九百千俱胝那餘多殑伽沙等如來。
translated: It is as if ninety-nine hundred thousand koṭis of nayutas of Ganges sands of tathāgatas
each with the entire bodily relics of a tathāgata
placed in the stūpa, no different.

original: 復更書此佛頂無垢普門三世如來心陀羅尼安於塔中。
analyzed: 復更書此佛頂無垢普門三世如來心陀羅尼安於塔中。
translated: Furthermore, write this Buddha's head, stainless universal gate, three times tathāgata heart dhāraṇī and place it in the stūpa.
The dhāraṇī says:🔽Oṃ tāre tuttāre ture svāhā🔽Oṃ tāre tuttāre ture svāhā

translated: Oṃ tāre tuttāre ture svāhā

analyzed: 僧賀囉九阿引喻十僧輸引馱野十一播引波十二
translated: 10. Aju 11. Sengshudaye 12. Papa

original: 薩哩嚩二合十三怛他引誐哆十四三滿覩引十五🔽塢瑟抳二合灑十六尾摩羅十七尾󰡊第引十八娑
analyzed: 薩哩嚩二合十三怛他引誐哆十四三滿覩引十五 塢瑟抳二合灑十六尾摩羅十七尾󰡊第引十八娑
translated: 9. Saṃhara 10. Āyur 11. Saṃskṛta 12. Prabhā 13. Sarva 14. Tathāgata 15. Samanta 16. Uṣṇīṣa 17. Vimala 18. Vidyā 19. Svāhā

analyzed: 嚩二合引賀引十九天主若有於此佛頂無垢普門
translated: O Lord of the Heaven, if one has reverence for this Buddha's crown, the pure universal gate

original: 三世如來心陀羅尼塔而生恭敬。
analyzed: 三世如來心陀羅尼塔而生恭敬。
translated: heart dhāraṇī stūpa of the tathāgatas of the three times,

original: 所有過去短命之業而得消除。
analyzed: 所有過去短命之業而得消除。
translated: all past karmas of short life will be eliminated.
Moreover, one's lifespan will be extended and protected by the devas.

original: 此人命終捨此身時由如蛇蛻。
analyzed: 此人命終捨此身時由如蛇蛻。
translated: When this person's life ends and they leave this body, it will be like a snake shedding its skin.
They will then be reborn in the Land of Bliss.

original: 不墮地獄傍生焰魔羅界。
analyzed: 不墮地獄傍生焰魔羅界。
translated: They will not fall into the hells, animal realms, or realms of Yama.
And will not fall into any evil destinies.
They will also not hear the name of hell.
They will attain such unprecedented rewards.
At that time, the Lord of the Heaven of the Thirty-three.
After bestowing this dhāraṇī upon the World-Honored One,
For the son of heaven Maṇi-garbha-vimala,
At that time, he went to his own palace.
First, in accordance with the ritual methods taught by the Tathāgata,
In accordance with the Dharma, he built a stūpa according to the characteristics of that Dharma.

original: 燒香禮拜一心念誦祈消業報。🔽當作之時彼摩尼藏無垢天子。
analyzed: 燒香禮拜一心念誦祈消業報。 當作之時彼摩尼藏無垢天子。
translated: He burned incense, made offerings, and single-mindedly recited the dhāraṇī, praying for the elimination of karmic retribution.

original: 所有一切罪業苦惱之報皆悉消除。
analyzed: 所有一切罪業苦惱之報皆悉消除。
translated: At the time of doing this, all the karmic offenses, suffering, and afflictions of the son of heaven Maṇi-garbha-vimala were completely eliminated.

original: 又復獲得殊勝之身如彼真金。
analyzed: 又復獲得殊勝之身如彼真金。
translated: Moreover, he attained an exceptionally excellent body like that of true gold.
His eyes were clear and bright, and his hair was lustrous and glossy.
Moreover, he attained all the Tathāgatas.
They appeared in the sky in front of him.
Those Tathāgatas exclaimed Excellent!

original: 時摩尼藏無垢天子得業清淨罪障消除。
analyzed: 時摩尼藏無垢天子得業清淨罪障消除。
translated: At that time, the son of heaven Maṇi-garbha-vimala, having attained the purification of karma and the elimination of karmic hindrances,
And seeing his own nature, gave rise to great joy.
He then spoke a verse, saying:

original: 如來不思議　　明力亦難思
analyzed: 如來不思議　　明力亦難思
translated: The Tathāgata is inconceivable, and the power of the dhāraṇī is also inconceivable.

original: 正法復亦然　　獲得見果報
analyzed: 正法復亦然　　獲得見果報
translated: The true Dharma is also like this, attaining the fruits of seeing the truth.
He further spoke a verse, saying:

original: 頂禮歸命真實際　　釋迦牟尼大導師
analyzed: 頂禮歸命真實際　　釋迦牟尼大導師
translated: I bow my head and take refuge in the true reality, the great guide Shakyamuni

original: 本行悲愍濟眾生　　隨願等同如意寶
analyzed: 本行悲愍濟眾生　　隨願等同如意寶
translated: Who originally practices compassion to save sentient beings, fulfilling wishes like a wish-fulfilling jewel.

original: 爾時摩尼藏無垢天子說此偈已。
analyzed: 爾時摩尼藏無垢天子說此偈已。
translated: At that time, after the son of heaven Manicintana Vimalagarbha spoke this verse,
He returned to his own palace.

original: 與諸眷屬天子天女之眾。
analyzed: 與諸眷屬天子天女之眾。
translated: Together with his retinue, sons of heaven, and heavenly maidens,

original: 各各執持種種天華華鬘。
analyzed: 各各執持種種天華華鬘。
translated: Each holding various heavenly flowers and flower garlands,
Various heavenly incense powders, incense for anointing,
Up to heavenly garments adorned with marvelous beauty.

original: 并天帝釋亦復嚴持天諸香華妙供養具。
analyzed: 并天帝釋亦復嚴持天諸香華妙供養具。
translated: And together with Indra, the king of the gods, he also solemnly held various heavenly incense, flowers, and wonderful offerings.

original: 復往覩史多宮詣世尊所。
analyzed: 復往覩史多宮詣世尊所。
translated: He further went to the Tusita Palace to the World-Honored One's place.
Having arrived at the Buddha's place, he made great offerings.

original: 復以種種天諸事業而為供養。
analyzed: 復以種種天諸事業而為供養。
translated: He further made offerings with various heavenly affairs.
He also circumambulated many hundreds of thousands of times.

original: 伸供養已坐世尊前而欲聞法。
analyzed: 伸供養已坐世尊前而欲聞法。
translated: Having made offerings, he sat before the World-Honored One, wishing to hear the Dharma.

original: 爾時會中四大天王梵王那羅延天大自在天金剛手大藥叉主等。
analyzed: 爾時會中四大天王梵王那羅延天大自在天金剛手大藥叉主等。
translated: At that time, in the assembly, the Four Heavenly Kings, Brahma King, Narayana, Mahesvara, Vajrapani, the great yaksha lord, and others,
joined their palms in respect before the World-Honored One.
They said to the World-Honored One, World-Honored One,
this Maṇi-garbha-vimala celestial prince,

original: 宿造何業獲得如是極惡果報。
analyzed: 宿造何業獲得如是極惡果報。
translated: what karma did he create in the past to obtain such an extremely evil retribution?
He suffers great pain and sorrow, immeasurable.

original: 佛言善哉善哉善男子快問斯義。
analyzed: 佛言善哉善哉善男子快問斯義。
translated: The Buddha said, Excellent, excellent! Good man, you have asked this question well.
Listen attentively, I will proclaim it for you.
Vajrapāṇi, in the past,

original: 彼南印度有城名廣圓滿。
analyzed: 彼南印度有城名廣圓滿。
translated: in the south of India, there was a city called Vast and Perfect.
There was a brāhman named Vimalakīrti.
He resided in that city as a Dharma teacher.

original: 性識聰敏善能分別諸法之相。
analyzed: 性識聰敏善能分別諸法之相。
translated: By nature, he was intelligent and could skillfully discern the characteristics of all dharmas.

original: 色貌端嚴形儀威肅見者歡喜。
analyzed: 色貌端嚴形儀威肅見者歡喜。
translated: His appearance was upright and dignified, and those who saw him rejoiced.

original: 有善信者當為說此心明。
analyzed: 有善信者當為說此心明。
translated: If there were faithful ones, he would expound this mind-dharma for them.

original: 而復廣為利益一切眾生故。
analyzed: 而復廣為利益一切眾生故。
translated: Moreover, it was for the sake of benefiting all sentient beings.
In this vidya-dhara mantra,
Always contemplate and carefully observe.

original: 是時復有長者名曰光明。
analyzed: 是時復有長者名曰光明。
translated: At that time, there was also an elder named Light.
He also lived in that city.
His wealth was immeasurable and he had great freedom.
All the Brahmins followed him.
Next, O Brahmin without defilements,

original: 一時為人解說此心明王陀羅尼。
analyzed: 一時為人解說此心明王陀羅尼。
translated: At one time, he explained this mind-vidya-dhara mantra for people.

original: 是時光明長者生不喜心作如是思惟。
analyzed: 是時光明長者生不喜心作如是思惟。
translated: At that time, the elder Light gave rise to an unhappy mind and had this thought:

original: 此婆羅門我當如魚如龜片片割截。
analyzed: 此婆羅門我當如魚如龜片片割截。
translated: I will cut this Brahmin into pieces like fish and turtles,
And smear excrement in his mouth.

original: 時彼長者作是思惟興惡心已。
analyzed: 時彼長者作是思惟興惡心已。
translated: When the elder had this thought and gave rise to an evil mind,
He immediately obtained the karmic retribution of white leprosy.

original: 受大疼痛極大苦惱直至命終。
analyzed: 受大疼痛極大苦惱直至命終。
translated: He suffered great pain and extreme agony until his death.
After his death,
He was born in the Avici Great Hell.
He stayed there for an eon, suffering great pain.
After leaving that hell, he was born among fish and turtles.
Also, for one eon, they will experience the retribution of suffering.
Afterwards, their lives will end.
They will then be reborn in the Great Black Rope Hell.
Experiencing great suffering, they will also be there for one eon.
Later, after leaving that hell,

original: 却於本住之城生盲種中。
analyzed: 却於本住之城生盲種中。
translated: they will be born in the blind caste in the city where they originally lived.
Born without eyes,

original: 以宿緣故得聞苾芻住彼彼寺。
analyzed: 以宿緣故得聞苾芻住彼彼寺。
translated: due to past causes and conditions, they will hear that bhikṣus are staying in various temples.
With a mind of faith and respect, they will personally search for them.
Those bhikṣus will always practice compassion.
Seeing them come, they will compassionately accept them.
They will then be given delicious food.

original: 然後復與解說此心明陀羅尼。
analyzed: 然後復與解說此心明陀羅尼。
translated: Afterwards, they will be given the explanation of this mind-clarity dhāraṇī.
Having heard it, they will carefully contemplate it.
In this life, they will attain the supernormal knowledge of past lives.
They will then be able to contemplate where they have come from.
They will also contemplate that the power of karma is very great.
Feeling immeasurable regret, they will think like this.
Then, they will immediately end their lives.
By the majestic power of the dhāraṇī,
they will be reborn in the Heaven of the Thirty-three, dwelling in a wonderful palace.

original: 與諸天女眷屬受大快樂。
analyzed: 與諸天女眷屬受大快樂。
translated: Together with the celestial maidens and retinue, they experience great bliss.
Due to the ripening of other karma, this suffering manifests before them.

original: 金剛手爾時彼長者生疑毀謗者。
analyzed: 金剛手爾時彼長者生疑毀謗者。
translated: Vajrapāṇi, at that time, the elder who gave rise to doubts and slander

original: 即摩尼藏無垢天子是金剛手彼摩尼藏無垢。
analyzed: 即摩尼藏無垢天子是金剛手彼摩尼藏無垢。
translated: Is none other than Maṇi-ratna-vimala, the celestial son. Vajrapāṇi, that Maṇi-ratna-vimala
Will experience such karmic retribution.

original: 後修善業歸命三寶漸證善果。
analyzed: 後修善業歸命三寶漸證善果。
translated: Later, cultivating wholesome karma, taking refuge in the Three Jewels, gradually realizing wholesome fruits,

original: 乃至當來獲得佛菩提故。
analyzed: 乃至當來獲得佛菩提故。
translated: And ultimately attaining Buddhahood in the future.

original: 金剛手爾時無垢婆羅門者。
analyzed: 金剛手爾時無垢婆羅門者。
translated: Vajrapāṇi, at that time, the pure brāhmaṇa
Later became a bhikṣu and was born blind again.
Explaining this dhāraṇī
Is none other than Mañjuśrī Kumārabhūta.
At that time, the great assembly of devas
Having heard this past event,

original: 歎言希有甚奇甚特歡喜無量。
analyzed: 歎言希有甚奇甚特歡喜無量。
translated: They exclaimed, How rare! How marvelous! How extraordinary! and were filled with immeasurable joy.
Then they spoke a verse, saying:

original: 不可思議大明力　　解脫三塗乃求得
analyzed: 不可思議大明力　　解脫三塗乃求得
translated: The inconceivable power of the great bright one liberates from the three evil paths and is attained.

original: 同如意寶而平等　　此實如來真三昧
analyzed: 同如意寶而平等　　此實如來真三昧
translated: Equal to the wish-fulfilling jewel, this is truly the Tathāgata's true samādhi.

original: 爾時彼眾會中九十二千天子得不退轉。
analyzed: 爾時彼眾會中九十二千天子得不退轉。
translated: At that time, ninety-two thousand sons of the gods in the assembly attained irreversibility.

original: 百千俱胝天女變女人相而成男子。
analyzed: 百千俱胝天女變女人相而成男子。
translated: One hundred thousand koṭīs of heavenly maidens transformed their female bodies into male bodies.
They also attained the stage of irreversibility.
At that time, Vajrapāṇi, the great yakṣa general,
addressed the Buddha, saying, World-Honored One,

original: 大不思議而能讚歎此大明王陀羅尼。
analyzed: 大不思議而能讚歎此大明王陀羅尼。
translated: the inconceivable praises of this great vidyā-rāja dhāraṇī

original: 世尊願更宣說成就儀軌。
analyzed: 世尊願更宣說成就儀軌。
translated: are spoken by the World-Honored One. Please further proclaim the methods for accomplishment.

original: 當使眾生於後時分獲得利益安樂。
analyzed: 當使眾生於後時分獲得利益安樂。
translated: May sentient beings in the future obtain benefits and happiness,

original: 不墮地獄傍生焰魔羅界。
analyzed: 不墮地獄傍生焰魔羅界。
translated: and not fall into the hells, animal realms, or the realm of Yama.
At that time, the World-Honored One, moved by their request,
told Vajrapāṇi, the great yakṣa general,

original: 諦聽諦聽我今為汝宣說此陀羅尼成就儀軌。
analyzed: 諦聽諦聽我今為汝宣說此陀羅尼成就儀軌。
translated: Listen carefully, listen carefully! I will now proclaim for you the methods for accomplishing this dhāraṇī.
In the future, in the latter time,

original: 若有族姓男族姓女苾芻苾芻尼鄔播索俱鄔播斯迦。
analyzed: 若有族姓男族姓女苾芻苾芻尼鄔播索俱鄔播斯迦。
translated: If there are sons and daughters of good family, bhikṣus, bhikṣuṇīs, upāsakas, and upāsikās,
Reciting this vidyārāja once,

original: 由如旋遶二十如來全身之塔。
analyzed: 由如旋遶二十如來全身之塔。
translated: It is the same as circumambulating twenty stūpas containing the entire body of a tathāgata.

original: 又若念誦此二如意寶一遍。🔽同彼十殑伽沙等百千俱胝那餘多如來所。🔽而種善根。
analyzed: 又若念誦此二如意寶一遍。 同彼十殑伽沙等百千俱胝那餘多如來所。 而種善根。
translated: Moreover, if one recites these two wish-fulfilling jewels once,🔽It is the same as planting roots of goodness🔽And obtaining great blessings and rewards in the presence of tathāgatas equal to the sands of ten Ganges Rivers,
Hundred koṭīs of nayutas.

original: 五無間業悉皆滅盡。🔽乃至地獄傍生焰魔羅界。
analyzed: 五無間業悉皆滅盡。 乃至地獄傍生焰魔羅界。
translated: All the five heinous crimes will be completely eradicated,🔽And one will be liberated from all evil karmic retributions in the hells, animal realms, and worlds of Yama.

original: 一切罪障皆得解脫復得長壽。
analyzed: 一切罪障皆得解脫復得長壽。
translated: One will also attain longevity.
When one's life ends in this world, it will be like a snake shedding its skin,

original: 即便往生安樂世界不受胞胎。
analyzed: 即便往生安樂世界不受胞胎。
translated: And one will immediately be reborn in the Land of Bliss without experiencing the womb.
One will be naturally born in a lotus flower.
Wherever one is born, one will attain the wisdom of recollecting past lives.

original: 又復恒常親近供養一切如來。
analyzed: 又復恒常親近供養一切如來。
translated: Moreover, one will always be able to draw near and make offerings to all tathāgatas.
All wishes will be fulfilled.

original: 若彼依法清淨澡浴著鮮潔衣。
analyzed: 若彼依法清淨澡浴著鮮潔衣。
translated: If one relies on the Dharma, takes a pure bath, and puts on fresh clean clothes,
one should make a square maṇḍala.
Using good birch bark, write this heart mantra.

analyzed: 欲生安樂世界應念即生。
